power.title: Blade Sweep
power.fluff: Though the fury of your attack is directed at a single foe, no nearby enemy is spared your wrath

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Each bloodied enemy within your reach takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: Non-bloodied enemies within your reach also take the damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: One bloodied enemy within your reach, other than the target, takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: You can choose a non-bloodied enemy instead.

section.name: Whirling Frenzy:
section.text: A second bloodied enemy within your reach, other than the target, takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your off-hand weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Blood Strike
power.fluff: Blood calls to blood, your and your enemy's pain giving strength to your assault

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC
If you are bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
If the target is bloodied, the attack deals +1d12 damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If the target is bloodied, it takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Brutal Slam
power.fluff: Your forceful blow pushes your foe into its companions

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature that is smaller than you, your size, or one size larger than you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares and knock it prone.
As long as the forced movement wasn't negated, one enemy adjacent to the target takes 6 + your Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: On a critical hit, the second enemy is also knocked prone.

power.title: Daring Charge
power.fluff: You leap forward and charge your foes, each strike against you only serving to embolden your attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You charge and use this attack in place of a melee basic attack. If an effect allows you to charge, you can use this power.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: You gain a bonus to all defenses equal to your Charisma modifier against attacks triggered by your movement during the charge.

section.name: Whirling Frenzy:
section.text: Each enemy that hits you with an attack triggered by your movement during the charge takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your off-hand weapon's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC
You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll for each attack triggered by your movement

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: For each attack triggered by your movement during the charge, you deal an additional +2 damage.

power.title: Hammer Fall
power.fluff: You swing your weapon in a great underhand arc, and the impact lifts your target off its feet and sends it crashing to the ground

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude
If the target is smaller than you, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares and knock it prone.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.
If the target is your size category or smaller, it is pushed 1 square.

power.title: Implacable Predator
power.fluff: You keep close to your foe after your strike, ready to follow if it tries to flee

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The first time the target moves or is pushed, pulled or slid before the end of your next turn, you can shift up to your speed to a square adjacent to the target as a free reaction after it has finished the move.

power.title: Longstrike Charge
power.fluff: You surge toward your target, using your momentum and the leverage from your weapon's length to land the blow

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You charge and use this attack in place of a melee basic attack. If an effect allows you to charge, you can use this power.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC
You gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll for each square you move during the charge

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

power.title: Rippling Blades
power.fluff: If your foe avoids your attack, you accept a glancing blow to maneuver it to a weak position

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You take damage equal to 1 + one-half the target's level. You gain a benefit based on your Feral Might.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: The next attack you hit the target with before the end of your next turn deals additional damage equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: The target has a penalty to all defenses against the next attack against it before the end of your next turn. The penalty equals your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Thunderborn Wrath:
section.text: You push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier. The next charge attack against it before the end of your next turn has combat advantage.

section.name: Whirling Frenzy:
section.text: You can make a melee basic attack using your off-hand weapon against the target.
